quest.name: Demolition Demo
journal:
Regitt needs a pilot to demonstrate the Rolling Tankard's firepower.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Pilot the Rolling Tankard to Clearmelt and fire its cannon at the target automaton.
Pilot the Rolling Tankard to Clearmelt and fire its cannon at the target automaton a second time.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: A few well-placed words from Lorathia, and we've got ourselves a gaggle of prospective buyers. They're over at Clearmelt right now, waiting on a demonstration of the Rolling Tankard's firepower!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: One of us could pilot the tank, of course... But, you know, I'd feel far more confident if a seasoned warrior such as yourself was guiding the cannon. Wouldn't be anywhere near as impressive if we missed the bloody target, eh?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Off you go, then! Wamutt will give you the pre-demonstration briefing.

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: Where've you been!? We need to get this show on the road!

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: Briefing shmiefing! Just get in the tank, drive it over to Clearmelt, and blast the target into next week! Easy!

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: What are you waiting for? Head over to Clearmelt, and blow those merchants away! Uh, with the demonstration─not the cannon.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: An automaton stands immobile, awaiting its fate with what seems almost an air of resignation... Speak to Wamutt at Watts's Anvil to pilot a Rolling Tankard, then command its main cannon to fire upon the automaton target.

dialogue.name: AUDIENCE03923
dialogue.text: (-Entranced Entrepreneur-)Oh, my! That cannon has quite a kick! Let's see you fire it one more time, if you please!

dialogue.name: AUDIENCE03923
dialogue.text: (-Entranced Entrepreneur-)Splendid! Just splendid! Enough power to discourage even the most monstrous eater, I'd wager. Mark me down as very interested, master dwarf.

dialogue.name: DWARF03923
dialogue.text: (-Dwarven Promoter-)Nice shootin', Forename! You can head back to the Anvil, if you like─I think Regitt'll be happy to hear how it all went!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Now there's the grin of a womanman who just left a smoking hole in the ground. I take it this means the demonstration went as planned?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Aye, we could describe it all we want, but Lorathia was right─there's naught better than showing off the destruction firsthand. I reckon we'll need to make this a regular event!
